comments:
Build ID: TPTP-4.4.0-200701310100

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create new default MRT
2. Do code generation for default MRT
3. when code generation is successful, maximize the code generation folder and double click on the muse.xml file, Internal error window shows up and it asks to exit the work bench.
4. Please check the attached screen shot and also below error log
